apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully depicts two women holding hands, rendered with distinct medium-light and medium skin tones that showcase Apple's commitment to inclusive representation. The characters are designed with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, giving them a friendly and approachable appearance. Realistic lighting emphasizes the gentle clasp of their hands, conveying a sense of connection, friendship, or romance, perfectly captured in the detailed 3D shading characteristic of Apple's emoji style.
